name: CPManeuver
desc: An object that describes a single navigation instruction.

items.name: var instructionVariants: [String]
items.desc: An array of instruction variants for the maneuver.

items.name: var dashboardInstructionVariants: [String]
items.desc: An array of instruction variants for the CarPlay dashboard.

items.name: var notificationInstructionVariants: [String]
items.desc: An array of instruction variants for notification banners.

items.name: var attributedInstructionVariants: [NSAttributedString]
items.desc: An array of attributed instruction variants for the maneuver.

items.name: var dashboardAttributedInstructionVariants: [NSAttributedString]
items.desc: An array of attributed instruction variants for the CarPlay dashboard.

items.name: var notificationAttributedInstructionVariants: [NSAttributedString]
items.desc: An array of attributed instruction variants for notification banners.

items.name: var initialTravelEstimates: CPTravelEstimates?
items.desc: An object that describes the distance and time remaining before the maneuver completes.

items.name: var symbolImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image that represents the maneuver.

items.name: var dashboardSymbolImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image for the CarPlay dashboard that represents the maneuver.

items.name: var notificationSymbolImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image for notification banners that represents the maneuver.

items.name: var junctionImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image that represents an upcoming junction.

items.name: var dashboardJunctionImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image for the CarPlay dashboard that represents an upcoming junction.

items.name: var userInfo: Any?
items.desc: A custom object associated with the maneuver.
